name: Project Durain
description:
Protect the forest as a mystical durian from creatures of darkness in this stealth/survival game.

Revive ten plants by using flute and save the forest.

Controls:

F: To play music

Control Keys: To Move

People Who created it:

Abu Bangurah: Programmer/Designer

Stefan: Designer/Artist

Tuan: Programmer/tester

Goblin King: Programmer

KingTrashBoat: Artist

Jacob Raymond: Artist

Daydream Sound: Sound Effects
